original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical systems, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes and translating them into efficient system configurations that drive organizational success. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally, analyze data, and identify optimization opportunities will be instrumental in ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support evolving business needs.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure clear alignment on business needs
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing tools such as database querying, report generation, and data visualization
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of industry best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing system maintenance and improvement
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and visualize data using appropriate tools
- Understanding of Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, iterative development environment

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, demonstrating a solid technical foundation
- Familiarity with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and their practical application in system configurations and process optimization

Required Experience:
- Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in a role that blends business and technical responsibilities, such as a business analyst, system analyst, or configuration specialist
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into technical solutions and configurations
- Experience working with enterprise-level systems and applications, particularly in the area of vehicle configuration

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience with Agile methodologies and their application in a collaborative, cross-functional environment
- Familiarity with the vehicle configuration space and the unique challenges and requirements associated with it

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in the use of [mention specific system] and its associated configuration tools
- Experienced in data analysis and visualization tools, such as SQL, Excel, and Tableau
- Comfortable working with project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence, Microsoft Teams)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be primarily desk-based, with occasional meetings and collaboration sessions with stakeholders
- You will be expected to work closely with cross-functional teams, including business analysts, developers, and IT support, to ensure the successful implementation and ongoing maintenance of system configurations
- The ability to adapt to changing priorities and work in a fast-paced, iterative environment is crucial for success in this role

Role Overview:
As a key member of our team, this role is responsible for bridging the gap between business operations and technical systems, ensuring that our [mention specific system] accurately reflects and supports the evolving needs of the organization. With a unique blend of business acumen and technical expertise, you will be instrumental in optimizing our vehicle configuration processes through the implementation of innovative solutions and best practices. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally, analyze complex data, and identify opportunities for improvement will be critical in driving organizational efficiency and success.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure clear alignment on objectives
- Translate complex business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and resolving any configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing tools such as database querying, report generation, and data visualization to uncover insights and drive informed decision-making
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through the implementation of configuration changes and industry best practices, leveraging your expertise in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to develop innovative solutions
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT), and provide comprehensive documentation to support ongoing system maintenance and improvement
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and knowledge-sharing

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to dissect complex business challenges and devise effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in data analysis, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and visualize data using appropriate tools to uncover insights and drive decision-making
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, iterative development environment

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, demonstrating a solid technical foundation and the ability to work with enterprise-level systems
- Proven expertise in the application of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques to optimize business processes and system configurations

Required Experience:
- Minimum of 5 years of experience in a role that combines business and technical responsibilities, such as a business analyst, system analyst, or configuration specialist
- Demonstrated track record of successfully translating complex business requirements into effective technical solutions and configurations
- Experience working with enterprise-level systems and applications, particularly in the area of vehicle configuration

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working in an Agile environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive continuous improvement
- Familiarity with the unique challenges and requirements associated with the vehicle configuration space

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in the use of [mention specific system] and its associated configuration tools
- Experienced in data analysis and visualization tools, such as SQL, Excel, and Tableau
- Comfortable working with project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence, Microsoft Teams)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will involve a mix of desk-based work and collaborative sessions with stakeholders, requiring the ability to adapt to a dynamic and fast-paced environment
- You will be expected to work closely with cross-functional teams, including business analysts, developers, and IT support, to ensure the successful implementation and ongoing maintenance of system configurations
- The ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and respond effectively to changing priorities is crucial for success in this role

Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between our business operations and technical systems, requiring a unique blend of analytical thinking, technical expertise, and a deep understanding of the vehicle configuration space. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into efficient and innovative system configurations that drive organizational success. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally, identify optimization opportunities, and leverage cutting-edge technologies like machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) will be instrumental in ensuring our [mention specific system] accurately reflects and supports the evolving needs of the business.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure clear alignment on objectives
- Translate complex business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing advanced data analysis tools and techniques to uncover insights that drive informed decision-making
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through the implementation of configuration changes and industry best practices, leveraging your expertise in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to develop innovative solutions that optimize our vehicle configuration capabilities
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT), and provide comprehensive documentation to support ongoing system maintenance and improvement
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations, fostering a collaborative environment that encourages continuous learning and knowledge-sharing

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to dissect complex business challenges and devise effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in advanced data analysis techniques, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and utilize data visualization tools to uncover insights and drive decision-making
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, iterative development environment

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, demonstrating a solid technical foundation and the ability to work with enterprise-level systems
- Proven expertise in the application of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques to optimize business processes and system configurations

Required Experience:
- Minimum of 7 years of experience in a role that combines business and technical responsibilities, such as a business analyst, system analyst, or configuration specialist
- Demonstrated track record of successfully translating complex business requirements into effective technical solutions and configurations, with a focus on the vehicle configuration space
- Experience working with enterprise-level systems and applications, particularly in the area of vehicle configuration, and a deep understanding of the unique challenges and requirements associated with this domain

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working in an Agile environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive continuous improvement and innovation
- Familiarity with industry best practices and emerging trends in the vehicle configuration space, and the ability to leverage this knowledge to develop cutting-edge solutions

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in the use of [mention specific system] and its associated configuration tools
- Experienced in advanced data analysis and visualization tools, such as SQL, Python, Tableau, and Power BI
- Comfortable working with project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence, Microsoft Teams)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will involve a mix of desk-based work, collaborative sessions with stakeholders, and occasional meetings or presentations to cross-functional teams
- You will be expected to work closely with business analysts, developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the successful implementation and ongoing maintenance of system configurations, while also taking a proactive role in identifying and driving innovative solutions
- The ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and respond effectively to changing priorities is crucial for success in this role, as is a strong commitment to continuous learning and improvement
